name: BULLETGAME
description:
BULLETGAME is a bullet hell game about exploring the sky as a air wizard, and seeing what is truly up there, even if the sky isn't real, even if this is all just a hallucination, even if you are on the verge of death and wake up.

WASD to Move.

Left Click to shoot.

Mouse Wheel to scroll through magic.

If your power hits 0, you lose.

Getting hit or using magic will lower your power.

Most importantly:

Don't have a Skill Issue.
